actionConfiguration.body:
WITH flattened AS (
  SELECT unnest(domains) AS domain
  FROM public.dns_query_summary
),
counts AS (
  SELECT
    domain,
    COUNT(*) AS count
  FROM flattened
  GROUP BY domain
),
top10 AS (
  SELECT
    domain,
    count
  FROM counts
  ORDER BY count DESC
  LIMIT 10
),
total AS (
  SELECT SUM(count) AS total_count FROM top10
)
SELECT
  t.domain,
  t.count,
  ROUND(100.0 * t.count / total.total_count, 2) AS pct
FROM top10 t, total
ORDER BY t.count DESC;
